info.title: Procurement-Related Activity
info.description: This service enables you to  create, read, update and delete  procurement-related activities from or  within the SAP S/4HANA system through  an API call.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete procurement-related activities from or in the SAP S/4HANA system using this service

values.text: [Activity Management in Procurement (19C)](https://rapid.sap.com/bp/#/scopeitems/19C " Link To BP ")
